Export.Routine: LVBCOM8085 ; ML 06/08/2002 ; Common routines - conversion for 6.4 q ; create sequence for DB blocks start n s x1="" f s x1=$o(^TTAB("SPEC",x1)) q:x1="" d .s x2="" f s x2=$o(^TTAB("SPEC",x1,"LA",x2)) q:x2="" d ..s x3="" f s x3=$o(^TTAB("SPEC",x1,"LA",x2,"BLOCK",x3)) q:x3="" s $p(^(x3),"\",5)=1 q
